title: Test Inline attachment with email size > 32 MB
custom_steps:
- Create Email outbound policy with multiple DLP Profiles 
- Draft Email with Inline attachment with DLP Sensitive content
- [Attachment >25 mb is not supported by Gmail]
- review ASP connection in smtpmod and dispatch logs
- Email should at receiver
- Look for Policy hit and alert
custom_expected:
- Verify policy hit happen and alert is generated
- SMTP won't add additional header and  Look out DLP failure shouldn't be due to file-size limit exceeded ; however It may fail with DLP SCAN TIMEOUT .
"dlp_fail_reason": "DLP Scan timeout",
"dlp_scan_failed": "yes"
- Verify no smtp proxy crash due to holding large emails
- It may have "DLP Scan timeout" for larger file
